dcterms:description: Historical daily gridded precipitation data for India from IMD, spanning the period from 1901 to 2022, at a spatial resolution of 1° × 1°.
dcterms:title: Historical daily gridded precipitation data for India from IMD

dcterms:description: NCEP (National Centre for Environmental Prediction) forecasts available for the period 2011-2022, providing gridded forecasts at 6-hour intervals for three time periods: 1, 2, and 3 days into the future.
dcterms:title: NCEP (National Centre for Environmental Prediction) forecasts

dcterms:description: IMD Global Forecasting System providing numerical weather prediction guidance.
dcterms:title: IMD Global Forecasting System

dcterms:description: Ground-based IMD rainfall data and satellite data from the Tropical Rainfall Measuring Mission used for deep learning based forecasting of Indian summer monsoon rainfall.
dcterms:title: Ground-based IMD rainfall data and satellite data from the Tropical Rainfall Measuring Mission
